home.parrafo-info: Student of Programming Technician and passionate about programming as a Full Stack Developer. As a technology and development enthusiast, I strive to create innovative projects that provide the best user experience.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a student of Technical Programming and a self-taught student of Full-Stack Web Development.
I aspire to obtain employment in the world of Web Development, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with competencies focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and constantly improving myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A useful and fun tool for those who need assistance with their daily tasks. A simple website that contains some mathematical tools.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: Learn to code with Web Code Academy. Find the best online courses to learn programming from scratch or improve your skills.
